name: Pulsa Stella (DEMO)
description:
Punch stuff to the beat as you make your way up a mountain. You won't be moving (dodging is cumbersome) so you have to punch every attack that comes your way.

Have fun!

P.S. this is a demo, full game will come out when it's ready
Note: check controls in the pause screen
Addenum: there's a mobile version, but i haven't finished setting up android export (will get that done eventually)
